mapper.select: SELECT e.festival_id AS "festivalId.value" , e.entry_id AS "entryId.value" , e.entry_name AS "entryName" , e.entry_description AS "entryDescription" , e.event_code AS "eventCode.value" , e.capacity AS "capacity.value" , e.participation_fees AS "participationFees.value" , e.application_numbers AS "applicationNumbers.value" , e.first_arrival_lottery_type AS "firstArrivalLotteryType" , e.application_start_date AS "applicationStartDate.value" , e.application_end_date AS "applicationEndDate.value" , e.entry_status AS "entryStatus" , le.lottery_date AS "lotteryDate.value" , le.following_entry_id AS "followingEntryId.value" FROM entries e LEFT JOIN lottery_entries le ON e.festival_id = le.festival_id AND e.entry_id = le.entry_id WHERE e.festival_id = #{festivalId.value} AND e.entry_id = #{entryId.value}
